pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, August 15, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Val-d’Or, Quebec

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Complexe Sportif construction site.

125, rue Self

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media should arrive no later than 10:15 a.m.

Malartic, Quebec

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Canadian Malartic mine.

Mine Canadian Malartic
100, chemin du Lac Mourier

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media should arrive no later than 12:15 p.m. at the security post

Rouyn-Noranda, Quebec

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with local business and community leaders.

Hôtel de ville de Rouyn-Noranda
100, rue Taschereau Est

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media should arrive no later than 3:15 p.m.

5:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a picnic with the Rouyn-Noranda community.

Place de la Citoyenneté et de la Coopération

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 4:30 p.m.

Media appearances

3:30 p.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on 99,1 Énergie Abitibi.

4:10 p.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on Région zéro 8, ICI Radio-Canada Première (Abitibi-Témiscamingue).
